short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Retrieve WHOIS details, including nameservers, contact information, and creation/expiration dates.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
OneClick for WHOIS Lookup

Unlock the power of web information with OneClick for WHOIS Lookup. 

This extension simplifies the retrieval of critical WHOIS details, including nameservers, contact information, registration specifics, as well as creation and expiration dates for any website.

Key Features:

Obtain WHOIS information from WHOIS.COM swiftly by clicking the extension button.


Please note that the extension provides swift access to WHOIS information, typically within a few seconds. Any delays experienced may be attributed to the website's server load time and not the extension's performance. Stay informed, secure, and efficient by installing OneClick for WHOIS Lookup today!
